function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of public acceptance of social distancing measures","Impact":"Risk of increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Promote education and awareness about the importance of social distancing","Technologies":"Public health communication strategies, social media outreach","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Ineffective implementation of multiple layers of social distancing","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness in containing the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Training and resources for effective implementation, coordination among relevant stakeholders","Technologies":"Coordination platforms, communication tools","People":"Public health officials, community leaders","Owner":"Public health agencies, local authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of clarity on duration and extent of social distancing measures","Impact":"Potential confusion and non-compliance with measures, leading to increased risk of spread","Mitigation":"Regular updates and clear communication on the duration and extent of measures","Technologies":"Public announcement systems, digital communication channels","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"}]}
